description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, and a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国广东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guangdong province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.
Xie Jian is from Zhanjiang, Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 谢坚是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Xie Jian is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，谢坚当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会广东地区代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Xie Jian was elected as a delegate representing the Guangdong region to the 13th National People's Congress.
